byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Rami Nazzal in Ramallah, West Bank, and Myra Noveck, Irit Pazner Garshowitz and Diaa Hadid in Jerusalem.

abstract: Global debate regarding Facebook, free speech and issue of incitement may be most keenly relevant to conditions in Israel, West Bank and Gaza, where terrorism is daily reality and role Facebook and other social media play in inciting it is deeply controversial; issue has taken on urgency after 14 months of repeated stabbings and vehicular assaults by Palestinians against Israelis.
lead_paragraph: Israel has pushed to combat online provocation that it links to bloodshed, while Palestinians consider a crackdown on posts just another tool of repression.
snippet: Israel has pushed to combat online provocation that it links to bloodshed, while Palestinians consider a crackdown on posts just another tool of repression....

headline.main: Facebook Struggles to Put Out Online Fires in Israeli-Palestinian Conflict
headline.print_headline: Facebook Struggles to Put Out Online Fires in Israeli-Palestinian Conflict
